SELECT O.id AS id, O.name AS name, O.address AS address, O.phone AS phone, O.total_price AS total_price, O.time AS time, O.id AS order_id, I.product_id AS product_id, I.quantity AS quantity, I.amount AS amount
FROM orderitems I INNER JOIN orders O ON I.order_id = O.id WHERE O.id = #{id}
